full_summary:
## Automated DNA or RNA Extraction System Request for Proposal

The Government of Canada, represented by the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is inviting proposals for the procurement of an Automated DNA or RNA Extraction System, including all necessary components, on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

## Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4406764904
*   **Reference Number**: Doc4406823335
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: January 23, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: February 12, 2024
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods

## Terms and Conditions

This request for proposal is conducted in accordance with the regulations outlined in the Canadian Free Trade Agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement. The procurement shall be governed by the laws of Canada.

## Mandatory Trade Agreements

The following trade agreements apply to this procurement:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Regions and Delivery

The Automated DNA or RNA Extraction System shall be delivered to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) at the designated locations in Quebec, Canada.

## Contracting and Contact Information

For further details and to submit proposals, please visit the link to the solicitation on the Ariba Discovery website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18596776?extsite=MTg1OTY3NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18596776?extsite=MTg1OTY3NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
